title: pre-chemoresistant stage, patient 1
characteristics_ch1.1: disease state: small cell lung cancer
extract_protocol_ch1: plasma exosomes isolated from two small cell lung cancer patients. RNA from plasma exosomes was isolated using the Qiagen miRNeasy Serum Plasma Kit. The minimum requirement for detection of Agilent 2100 is 1μL 10 ng/μL sample
extract_protocol_ch1.1: miRNAs libraries Starts from the RNA that has passed the quality inspection, the 3' -end adaptor is linked, the reverse primer is hybridized, the 5' -end adaptor is linked, the reverse transcription is made into DNA, and then PCR amplification is performed
data_processing: The original image data was transformed into Sequenced Reads for Base Calling analysis using software BCL2FASTQ2 (V2.19.0)
data_processing.1: Sequenced reads were trimmed for adaptor sequence, and masked for low-complexity or low-quality sequence, then mapped to whole genome using bowtie
data_processing.2: The analysis method of miRNA expression abundance is to count according to the mapping position of read on the genome. It is necessary to verify whether the position of read is consistent with the mature sequence of known miRNA, and if the position is inconsistent, no statistics will be taken. Mirdeep2 software is used to analyze and process this part;S01(norm) : Counts per million reads after miRNA standardization in the S01 sample. The following header of the same format has the same meaning.
data_processing.4: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: Abundance of miRNA expression of each sample
contact_institute: The First Affiliated Hospital of University of Science and Technology of China
